Site: jestjs.io . Enzyme - JavaScript Testing utility that makes it easier to test your Components. Site: enzymejs.github . enzyme-adapter-react-17 - Provisional adapter react 17 to works enzyme. Site: adapter . React Hooks Testing Library - Simple and complete React hooks testing utilities that encourage good testing practices.. Site: react-hooks-testing-library.com . Configuration Example configuration test environment in setupTests.js import Enzyme from 'enzyme'; import Adapter from '@wojtekmaj/enzyme-adapter-react-17'; Enzyme.configure({ adapter: new Adapter() }); import {createSerializer} from 'enzyme-to-json'; expect.addSnapshotSerializer(createSerializer({mode: 'deep'})); Commands yarn test - Run suite test
